description: This 130-meter escort ship is armed only with 75mm vulcan cannons, missile launchers, and torpedo tubes, and has no internal storage for mobile armors. The Bernard and the Law - members of the advance force which comes to meet the Archangel - are escort ships of this type, as are the 8th Fleet`s Seleukos, Antigonos, Xerxes, and Belgrano.
name: 130m-class escort
